examples.description: replaces long words with their expected short form
examples.full_description: tweet shortener #word_substituter replaces long words with their expected short form

examples.description: shortens each tweet and prints the results
examples.full_description: tweet shortener #bulk_tweet_shortener shortens each tweet and prints the results

examples.description: shortens tweets that are more than 140 characters
examples.full_description: tweet shortener #selective_tweet_shortener shortens tweets that are more than 140 characters

examples.description: does not shorten tweets that are less than 130 characters
examples.full_description: tweet shortener #selective_tweet_shortener does not shorten tweets that are less than 130 characters

examples.description: truncates tweets over 140 characters after shortening
examples.full_description: tweet shortener #shortened_tweet_truncator truncates tweets over 140 characters after shortening

examples.description: does not shorten tweets shorter than 140 characters.
examples.full_description: tweet shortener #shortened_tweet_truncator does not shorten tweets shorter than 140 characters.
